entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 4:50 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
